name: Polygon Poker
description:
Polygon Poker is a simple poker game based in Picture Poker, a minigame in New Super Mario Bros DS. 

The objective of the game is to accumulate coins by getting better cards than your opponent. More information about the possible card combinations can be found by clicking on the tab at the top right of the game.

The HTML5 version can not save the game, if you want to save the game play the Windows version, download it bellow.
